name: CrawlerProtection
author: MyWikis LLC
description: Suite of protective measures to protect wikis from crawlers.

CrawlerProtectWhatLinksHere.description: If true (default), protects Special:WhatLinksHere from anonymous users.

CrawlerProtectRecentChangesLinked.description: If true (default), protects Special:RecentChangesLinked from anonymous users.

CrawlerProtectHistory.description: If true (default), protects the history from anonymous users.

CrawlerProtectDiff.description: If true (default), protects diffs from anonymous users.

CrawlerProtectRevision.description: If true (default), protects revisions from anonymous users.
